hands: Hands up if you’ve ever lied about why you were late to school.
Hands up if you’ve blamed someone else for something you 100% did.
Hands up if you’ve cheated on a quiz and still failed it.
Hands up if you’ve ever DM’d someone just because you were bored.
Hands up if you’ve faked being sick to skip school.
Hands up if you’ve gotten caught laughing during a serious moment.
Hands up if you’ve hated someone for no real reason.
Hands up if you’ve ignored a text just because you didn’t feel like replying.
Hands up if you’ve judged someone’s outfit and then wore something worse the next day.
Hands up if you’ve kept a secret you probably should’ve told.
Hands up if you’ve lied to make a story sound better.
Hands up if you’ve made a fake account or used one to stalk someone.
Hands up if you’ve never actually read the assigned book but still BS'd the essay.
Hands up if you’ve posted something just to make someone jealous.
Hands up if you’ve quit a group project halfway through and let others carry it.
Hands up if you’ve ruined the vibe of a group chat at least once.
Hands up if you’ve talked behind someone’s back and then acted cool with them.
Hands up if you’ve used someone for homework or answers.
Hands up if you’ve worn the same outfit two days in a row and hoped no one noticed.
Hands up if you’ve exaggerated a story so much it barely had any truth left.
Hands up if you’ve yelled at a sibling for something you also do.
Hands up if you’ve zoned out during a conversation and just nodded like you heard everything.
